column3: When I grew up in the South, I was taught that segregation was the will of God, and the Bible was quoted to prove it. I was taught that women were by nature in inferior to men, and the Bible was quoted to prove it. I was taught that it was okay to hate other religions, and especially the Jews, and the Bible was quoted to prove it.
Ah! How often when I have been abroad on the mountains has my heart risen in grateful praise to God that it was not my destiny to waste and pine among those noisome congregations of the city.

Why did the earthquake and tsunami occur in Japan? Was it the act of an angry God? No, it was the result of the movement and collision of the earth's tectonic plates - a process driven by the earth's need to regulate its own internal temperature. Without the process that creates earthquake, our planet could not sustain life.
Question with boldness even the existence of a God; because, if there be one, he must more approve of the homage of reason, than that of blind-folded fear.
As the poet said, 'Only God can make a tree,' probably because it's so hard to figure out how to get the bark on.
Not only is there no God, but try finding a plumber on Sunday.
When you say a situation or a person is hopeless, you are slamming the door in the face of God.
Hope is the word which God has written on the brow of every man.
Marrying for love may be a bit risky, but it is so honest that God can't help but smile on it.
We have to pray with our eyes on God, not on the difficulties.
What a piece of work is a man, how noble in reason, how infinite in faculties, in form and moving how express and admirable, in action how like an angel, in apprehension how like a god.
Art is nature speeded up and God slowed down.
That deep emotional conviction of the presence of a superior reasoning power, which is revealed in the incomprehensible universe, forms my idea of God.
I believe that God felt sorry for actors so he created Hollywood to give them a place in the sun and a swimming pool. The price they had to pay was to surrender their talent.
I will do my best. That is all I can do. I ask for your help - and God's.
Of all human activities, man's listening to God is the supreme act of his reasoning and will.
We learn by practice. Whether it means to learn to dance by practicing dancing or to learn to live by practicing living, the principles are the same. One becomes in some area an athlete of God.
Behold a worthy sight, to which the God, turning his attention to his own work, may direct his gaze. Behold an equal thing, worthy of a God, a brave man matched in conflict with evil fortune.
To believe in God is impossible not to believe in Him is absurd.
We are not weak if we make a proper use of those means which the God of Nature has placed in our power... the battle, sir, is not to the strong alone it is to the vigilant, the active, the brave.
Be such a man, and live such a life, that if every man were such as you, and every life a life like yours, this earth would be God's Paradise.
In view of the fact that God limited the intelligence of man, it seems unfair that He did not also limit his stupidity.

As we become purer channels for God's light, we develop an appetite for the sweetness that is possible in this world. A miracle worker is not geared toward fighting the world that is, but toward creating the world that could be.
I read the book of Job last night, I don't think God comes out well in it.
The just is close to the people's heart, but the merciful is close to the heart of God.
I have never made but one prayer to God, a very short one: 'O Lord make my enemies ridiculous.' And God granted it.
